Detailed Description

General definition of sequence contains samples in regular time grid.

All samples has the same number of channels components.

Definition at line 18 of file ISamplesSequence.h.

virtual double imeas::ISamplesSequence::GetSamplingPeriod (  )  const [pure virtual]

Get sampling period of this sequence.

Sampling period is time difference between samples. If returned value is not positive, no period is known.

Implemented in imeas::CGeneralSamplesSequence, and imeas::TDiscrSamplesSequence< Element >.
